name: Basic Plan
description: Ideal for individuals who want to stay fit with essential gym access.
features: Access to gym facilities during regular hours

name: Standard Plan
description: Perfect for fitness enthusiasts who want more variety and support.
features: Extended gym access (early morning & late night)
Unlimited use of cardio and strength equipment
Access to all group fitness classes

name: Premium Plan
description: Best for individuals who want full access, premium facilities, and personalized training.
features: Unlimited access to all group fitness & yoga classes
